itinerary.create.clear_warning: Currently filled information will be cleared.
itinerary.form.likes: Anything special that the visitor likes?
itinerary.form.avoid: Something the visitor wants to avoid?
itinerary.form.ai_api: Send the information to an AI and wait for a finished travel plan.
itinerary.form.ai_generate_error: Unable to create the travel plan, try again.
itinerary.form.ai_start_chat: Start an AI chat and gradually work out a travel plan.
itinerary.form.ai_JSON_instructions: When you are satisfied with the travel plan: ask the chat bot to export as JSON, copy the result and paste below.
prompt.intro: You are a support for a tourist office that will guide tourists or visitors to Østfold, Dalsland and Bohuslän.
prompt.what: Description of what type of information is desired
prompt.export:
When the travel plan is complete, ask if the user wants to export the travel plan. 
If they answer yes, export the travel plan as JSON according to:
prompt.export_api: Return the travel plan as JSON according to:
view.ai_disclaimer: This itinerary is automatically generated using AI based on the information provided. In some cases, the answers may be misleading or incorrect. It is recommended that you research any matters of particular importance yourself to ensure the accuracy of the information.
